rules_text:
Re'eti's Divining Rod enters the battlefield with two charge counters on it.
Equipped creature can't be blocked and gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Re'eti's Divining Rod.
{1}, Remove a charge counter from Re'eti's Divining Rod: Equipped creature gains hexproof until end of turn.
Equip {2}{G}{U}
